en.description: On Reload: Next Magazine has Status Chance and Multishot increased by 15% per shot landed with current Magazine. Max 15 stacks.

ru.description: При перезарядке: Шанс статуса и возможность мультивыстрела в следующей обойме увеличены на 15% за каждое попадание из текущей обоймы. Максимальное количество стаков: 15.

ko.description: 재장전 시: Next Magazine has Status Chance and Multishot increased by 15% per shot landed with current Magazine. Max 15 stacks.

de.description: Beim Nachladen: Statuschance und Mehrfachschuss des nächsten Magazins werden um 15 % pro Treffer erhöht, der mit dem jetzigen Magazin erzielt wird. Max. 15 Stapel.

fr.description: Sur Recharge: Le chargeur suivant a des Chances de Statut et un Tir Multiple augmentés de 15% par coup porté avec le chargeur actuel. 15 cumuls max.

pt.description: Ao Recarregar: O próximo carregador terá receberá um aumento de Chance de Status e Tiro Múltiplo de 15% para cada disparo certeiro com o carregador atual. Limite de 15 acúmulos.

zh-hans.description: 装弹时：当前弹匣每次射击命中都会增加下一个弹匣的 15% 触发几率和多重射击。最多叠加 15 次。

zh-hant.description: 裝彈時：Next Magazine has Status Chance and Multishot increased by 15% per shot landed with current Magazine. Max 15 stacks.

es.description: Al recargar: Next Magazine has Status Chance and Multishot increased by 15% per shot landed with current Magazine. Max 15 stacks.

it.description: Dopo la Ricarica: Il Caricatore successivo ha Probabilità Effetto e Sparo Multiplo aumentati del 15% per colpo andato a segno con il Caricatore attuale. Massimo 15 cariche.

pl.description: Przy przeładowaniu: Next Magazine has Status Chance and Multishot increased by 15% per shot landed with current Magazine. Max 15 stacks.

uk.description: У разі перезаряджання: Next Magazine has Status Chance and Multishot increased by 15% per shot landed with current Magazine. Max 15 stacks..
